mapper.sql: SELECT stack.stack_id, stack.workplace_id, workplace.company_id, company.company_name, workplace.workplace_name, stack.stack_name, stack.prevention, stack.reg_date, stack.note from stack INNER JOIN workplace ON workplace.workplace_id = stack.workplace_id INNER JOIN company ON company.company_id = workplace.company_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stack (workplace_id, stack_name, prevention, reg_date, note) VALUES (#{workplace_id}, #{stack_name}, #{prevention}, #{reg_date}, #{note})
